attributes.action: give the police and courts proper powers to deal with yob and anti social behavour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Or admit that they have no powers and allow the public to take back the streets. So that we the law abiding citizens, can feel safe to walk the streets , and not feel intimidated by the yobs. These scum that the police and the courts  are not able or willing to deal with properly and who cause misery to the rest of the nation.
